definition: industry chain (concept proposed by US scholar Michael Porter in 1985)
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain

sentences.english: The industrial catenary after reframing perhaps says ecosystem, who can become chain advocate?
sentences.chinese: 重構之後的產業鏈或者說生態系統，誰會成爲鏈主？

sentences.english: How to play a better role in the value chain of marketing?
sentences.chinese: 如何對於整個營銷各產業鏈扮演好自己的角色？

sentences.english: Current PTA production pressures are mainly concentrated in the middle and lower reaches of the chain.
sentences.chinese: 目前PTA產業鏈上的生產壓力主要集中在中下游。
產業鏈上游能夠產生巨大的利潤。

sentences.english: Implement industrial chain integration of different industries for industrial equity investment.
sentences.chinese: 實業股權投資，針對的分行業進行產業鏈整合。

sentences.english: Flourished development of meat duck industry continuously expands Saifeiya industrial chain.
sentences.chinese: 肉鴨產業的蓬勃發展帶來了塞飛亞產業鏈的不斷延伸。

sentences.english: On the other hand, some industry leaders to start building their own chain.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，一些行業龍頭開始建立自己的產業鏈。

sentences.english: Is Youngor's industry chain a kind of successful mode?
sentences.chinese: 雅戈爾的產業鏈是否爲一種成功的模式？

sentences.english: In the flow inside whole industry catenary , license plate is one fraction only.
sentences.chinese: 在整個產業鏈裏面的流程，牌照只是一小部分。

sentences.english: We will increase efforts to develop national high-tech industrial bases and industry chains.
sentences.chinese: 進一步加強國家高技術產業基地和產業鏈建設。

sentences.english: "We want to create a U.S. enterprise, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “我們將創造一個美國的產業鏈”他說道。

sentences.english: Comprehensive information on rural construction as the center of a new call that is out of the industry chain.
sentences.chinese: 以農村全面信息化建設的爲中心的新產業鏈呼之即出。

sentences.english: The main process chain, by-process chain and social -link chain are also designed.
sentences.chinese: 同時建立了生態鋼鐵工業產業鏈和社會功能鏈。

sentences.english: The zoo shop can do a nice line in panda-related merchandise.
sentences.chinese: 動物園可以做一系列與熊貓有關的優質產業鏈。

sentences.english: They will wish to move up the technology and value chain.
sentences.chinese: 他們會希望慢慢轉移到科技和價值產業鏈上。

sentences.english: Unsold stocks of complete bicycles are clogging the distribution chain.
sentences.chinese: 未銷售出去的成車庫存正在影響着整個產業鏈。

definition: to join up/to dock/a joint (between components)
e-commerce (abbr. for 電子商務|电子商务[dian4 zi3 shang1 wu4])/(old) to negotiate by telegram or telephone
